content.rendered:
Microsoft Office Home & Business 2016 comes with all the classic apps you need to get your work done at home or in your small business. It includes the 2016 versions of Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote, Access,  Outlook. The software can be installed on a PC.
  • This is an outright purchase of Home & Business 2016 so you don’t have to worry about renewals.
  • You will receive the classic 2016 versions of Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote, Access, and Outlook.
  • The 2016 version of Excel comes with a variety of new chart types allowing you to display your data in different ways.
  • With the 2016 version of Outlook you’ll be able to use the @ symbol to add contacts into your email or calendar item for a more streamlined experience.
  • PowerPoint includes a new Zoom option which allows you to deliver non-linear presentations, seamlessly switching between slides.

its a Digital Download which  means Activation Code and Download link sent to via Email Only.

No CD/DVD/USB has been physically shipped to you

The key is for one (1) device only.

This is a 100 % Original Microsoft Office 2016 Home and Busniess for MAC 

The product key will activate the  full version of Microsoft Office 2016 Home & Busniess 

It’s compatible with PCs running Mac 

The Microsoft Office 2016 HB  will activate the multilingual language version. Any language version is supported. For example English, Spanish, German, French ..
